verses.name: Acts 7:27
verses.text: But he that did his neighbour wrong thrust him away, saying, Who made thee a ruler and a judge over us?

verses.name: Acts 7:28
verses.text: Wilt thou kill me, as thou diddest the Egyptian yesterday?

verses.name: Acts 7:29
verses.text: Then fled Moses at this saying, and was a stranger in the land of Madian, where he begat two sons.

verses.name: Acts 7:30
verses.text: And when forty years were expired, there appeared to him in the wilderness of mount Sina an angel of the Lord in a flame of fire in a bush.
